system.description:
When you give a speech on morality and heroism, you can provoke someone with Savior instead of Superior.

When you provoke someone susceptible to your words, say what you’re trying to get them to do and roll + Savior.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Mark Potential and the GM makes a move.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
For NPCs:

Choose one:

    • They @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.GCshG4oYj0wYgHyL]{stumble}: you take +1 forward against them
    • They @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.AJZecxtTHrIRZaMJ]{err}: you gain a critical opportunity
    • They @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.2gJN58tnNFtrG1Vx]{overreact}: you gain influence over them

 

@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.zSuokj4TMAbZSgXP]{For PCs:}

Choose one.

  • If they do it, add a Team to the pool
  • If they don’t do it, they mark a condition

success.label: Success!
success.value:
For NPCs:

They rise to the bait and do what you want.

 

@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.zSuokj4TMAbZSgXP]{For PCs:}

Both. 

  • If they do it, add a Team to the pool
  • If they don’t do it, they mark a condition
